mainSection.title: No.Thing Project
mainSection.hintBadgeText: Press and hold to create Everything!

aboutSection.description_1: No.Thing Project is a movement, a mindset, and a platform for transformation
aboutSection.description_2: It is the idea that nothing is not emptiness but a starting point - a space where creativity, innovation, and change can emerge.
aboutSection.description_3: We embrace minimalism as a tool for clarity and inspiration, proving that even from nothing, something extraordinary can be built.
